BitEx - Crypto-currency Exchange API Framework¶

Bitex is a Python framework to connect easily with a variety of Crypto Currency Exchanges. It enables trader/developers to focus on their trading algoritms and strategies without the need of any knowledge of specific Exchange APIs.

Quick Links¶

  • Current version: 2.0.0 (download from PyPI,)
  • Source (github)

As easy as it is¶

Here is a simple example requesting the ticker info

from bitex import Bitfinex
from bitex.pairs import ETHBTC

def main():
    b = Bitfinex()
    response = b.ticker(ETHBTC)
    print(response.json())

if __name__ == "__main__":
   main()

This example does not use authentication. It simply connects to the public API of Bitfinex and requests the ticker for ETH-BTC.

Installation¶

pip install BitEx

Prerequisites: BitEx runs on Python 3.3+
